short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and effective web crawler extension designed to help users easily extract and manage data from web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and effective web crawler extension designed to help users easily extract and manage data from web pages. With an intuitive interface and powerful features, this extension allows users to select specific HTML elements, exclude unwanted content, and download the extracted data in a CSV format. 


Whether you're gathering information for research, SEO analysis, or content management, this tool provides a streamlined solution for your web scraping needs

User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use interface for selecting and extracting data from web pages.

Flexible Selectors: Use CSS selectors to precisely target the HTML elements you need.\n- **Exclusion Options**: Exclude specific elements and words to refine your data extraction.

CSV Export: Download your extracted data in CSV format for easy analysis and integration.

Customizable Settings: Save your settings and preferences for repeated use.

Quick Setup: Simple setup process with minimal configuration required.

This extension is ideal for researchers, SEO professionals, content managers, and anyone who needs to efficiently collect and organize data from websites. Save time and increase productivity with our robust web crawler extension.
